sports.description: Weather station data can be used for planning outdoor activities and managed as per weather disruptions.

questions.q1: What kind of data can I collect from the weather station?
questions.q2: Can I access the weather stations real-time data remotely?
questions.q3: Is the weather station durable against harsh weather?
questions.q4: Do I have to install air quality monitors for air monitoring with the weather station?

answers.a1: Weather station measures various meteorological parameters including temperature, humidity, wind speed and direction, rainfall and many more.
answers.a2: Yes, accessing the weather station's real-time data is possible with remote monitoring capabilities.
answers.a3: Yes, the weather station is designed to resist various environmental conditions.
answers.a4: With Prana Air weather station, you can turn the device into air quality monitoring system with the advanced variant.
